>
[Magical Adaptation](/Feats.aspx?ID=1991) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 177 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Horizon Walker](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=63)

**Prerequisites**
[Horizon Walker Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=1987)

</column>

---

When an obstacle bars your path, you pull a trick from your sleeve to overcome it. You can cast [_darkvision_](/Spells.aspx?ID=60), [_spider climb_](/Spells.aspx?ID=299), and 4th-level [_water breathing_](/Spells.aspx?ID=370) as innate primal spells, each once per day.
